instruction: Generate a plan for spending a weekend in San Francisco.
output: For an exciting weekend in San Francisco, plan to start your day early on Saturday morning. Start by exploring the city on foot or by taking a classic San Francisco trolley tour. Then enjoy brunch at a local cafe, followed by a visit to the Golden Gate Park or the Aquarium of the Bay. Afterward, take a stroll down the famous Lombard Street or take a cable car ride. Then spend the evening exploring Chinatown or the Mission District. On Sunday, take a ferry to Alcatraz Island, visit Pier 39, and then embark on an evening cruise of the San Francisco Bay.
